Name: Christmas Santa Troubles
About the game: Santa was preparing to deliver presents for boys and girls all over the world, but nasty Grinch has broke Santa's sleigh and he fall down on the North pole and lost all presents, so Christmas celebration is under threat. Our brave character decides to return the presents and bring the celebration back. Enter the snow area to pick all presents on the levels to move to the next area. Collect all sweets during the game, avoid saws, spikes, icicles and falling to abyss - you will help main character come back all gifts and Christmas will be saved. Santa will prepare his sleigh and move on worldwide giving out presents for all kids on the planet. help Santa, save the Christmas! Key features: - Pretty graphics; - Casual gameplay; - Huge amount of levels; - Unforgettable adventure; - Easy to enjoy game mechanics;
